text: I have a suicide plan and I'm going to do it tonight.
Life feels pointless and I don't want to be here.
I burned myself with a lighter this morning.
My boyfriend choked me during our fight.
I was raped by someone I knew.
The nursing home staff is hitting my father.
I'm planning to shoot my neighbor tomorrow.
The voices are telling me to kill people.
I'm having unprotected sex with strangers, feeling amazing!
My heart is racing from not eating for weeks.
I'm going through alcohol withdrawal and shaking badly.
I think I'm having a heart attack right now.
